alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 24 at 2:52AM MST until January 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT... Moderate to Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with areas of higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central Colorado. * WHEN...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow packed road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy snow band is anticipated to set up within the watch area with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour. The location of the highest snow amounts will be dependent on where this band sets up.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
